Desc.entry: A large acute unit for children aged under 16 years, providing general, specialist and accident and emergency services. 150 beds and 24-hour accident and emergency service. Open visiting and resident parents are welcomed. Limited pay and display parking and the hospital recommends that visitors use public transport when travelling to and from the hospital whenever possible. Sheffield Childrens NHS Foundation Trust also provides the following services: Ryegate Children's Centre and Community Paediatric Services (see separate entries).
